Articles.Content: Guys please help me, I can't figure out how to make RPM monitor screenshot, I found that I have a lot of screenshots files in screenshot folder that I made accidentally, but I didn't figure out what to press to make it
F1 by default in windows.  The full key bindings are here https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Key_bindings

Another way to screenshot from Windows:
ALT+PrtSc will save a screenshot to the clipboard.
This can be especially handy when you want to go straight to editing said screenshots or simply a quick share, without actually saving the file in your screenshots folder.

If you are using windows 10 you can also use the game bar (win+g), this has video recording options too including background recording which is handy if something cool happened that you weren’t expecting.

Thanks, but I'm asking about RPM monitor screenshot, I guess it's very simple, something like mouse click or so. Here's the examples, I have a lot of such files in my screenshot folder.



 

Edited November 10, 2017 by Andrey.gr
Oh, sorry I’ve never used that mod.
